time.description: GoCompare - Software Engineer Apprentice - Training to be the best software developer in the whole wide web. I am currently learning how to use Mvc and Entity Framework to build tools for GoCompare. We use C#, Javascript, Html, CSS and many other magic tools

GoCompare - Software Engineer Apprentice - Training to be the best software developer in the whole wide web. I am currently learning how to use Mvc and Entity Framework to build tools for GoCompare. We use C#, Javascript, Html, CSS and many other magic tools

Legal and General - Junior Web Analyst - Analysing Data to help the business grow and predict Customers' needs and wants. I spent almost one year with a brand new Analytics team, using Adobe Analytics and Warehouse technologies.
Legal and General - Sales Consultant - Helping the right insurance policy find a warm and loving home to the right customers

Agnelli's Deli - Restaurant Supervisor - Making sure all the delicious food is presented in all its beauty to the customers. Storing of food, handling and counting money daily and resercing great new recipes to change the week's specials

Soho's Secret Tea Room - Floor Supervisor - Making sure all customers get a special treatment and taste the best teas in town. Storing teas and food on high quality standards. Researching new teas to buy and offer to customers

Nettuno Administration- English Speaking Interpreter - Making sure that the foreign English speaking administration that visit the town understand what is going on and assure great communication to avoid international crisis

National Institute of Statistics - Census Analyst - Making sure that data about the local population is collected and stored properly. Reach out to isolated members of the community to register their responses
